creator: andre.laurent@vivium.lu
text: With security constraints set up, I have noticed that the javascript window.open () does not work properly when calling a local program (such as Acrobat Reader, MS-Word, notepad …) through Mime extensions. With PDF files, the new window opens and displays a blank page. With MS-Word, notepad …, an error occurs saying (translated in English) : Internet Explorer cannot download the file xxxxx from xxxxx. The page requested is unavailable or cannot be found. Code example : function ouvrir (pdf) { window.open (pdf, 'fenetre', 'location=no,menubar=yes,resizable=yes') ; }

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This is a 'feature' of how IE implements caching. You need to use
<Context>
  <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.authenticator.BasicAuthenticator"  securePagesWithPragma="false" />
</Context>

or equivalent for your authentication mechanism.

Please ask on the users list if you need further assistance with this.
